item.title: Spiked weeds/ thorns, 18th August
item.description:
Thorny overgrowth emanating from the northern boundary fence of Trinity Laban Conservatoire Of Music & Dance, causing pedestrians to not be able to use the path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Berthon Street, Deptford, London

item.title: Car parked across lowered kerb, 18th August
item.description:
Driver of car Registration plate Audi LS15 SZZ. Puts cones out on street during the daytime then in the evening parks here every day. Contravention: Code 27 Contravention: Code 27 Parked in a special enforcement area adjacent to a footway, cycle track or verge lowered to meet the level of the carriageway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clive Way, Southbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Estate Agent Sign Illegally Attached to Park Railings, 18th August
item.description:

item.title: Littering everywhere, 18th August
item.description:
The surrounding area has not been maintained for some time, making it look unkempt.

item.title: West Bank overflowing rubbish and rats, 18th August
item.description:
The whole of West Bank is constantly covered in rubbish, residents and fly tipping. The streets regularly smells like rotten rubbish. And there is a rat problem with rats visible at all times of day amongst people’s rubbish.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunsmure Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big tree by phone box on Rodway Road needs pruning, 18th August
item.description:
This tree is out of control. It’s blocking a lot of sunlight for surrounding houses and sheds huge masses of leaves each year, which residents have to deal with. Tree is now growing up from bottom and not leaving a lot of space for pedestrians whilst also providing a great hiding place for the local druggies and it’s starting to look messy and overgrown. Please can you arrange to trim and prune this tree. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sinclairs Cottages, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Business signage obstruction, 18th August
item.description:
There are 2 signs at the opening of the alleyway, that are obstructing the pavement and reducing visibility. There was only 1 sign not long ago, and while it reduced visibility along the road, there's now 2. As a pedestrian it's difficult to see if it's safe to cross the alleyway, and as a driver you can't be sure if a pedestrian is about to appear from behind them. A visually impaired person, would struggle to navigate round them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185, Manor Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattresses and assorted household junk, 18th August
item.description:
At this regular spot for flytipping - a dead end in the pedestrianised Newington Estate - we currently have dumped mattresses and assorted household junk which have been there for at least a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Canterbury Place, Elephant and Castle, London

item.title: Charlton Park Lane-nearer to Cemetery lane, 18th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stadium Road, Charlton, London
